abstract: Opposition party spokesman Gasenyi Patrice Gahungu is fatally shot in Burundi, latest killing related to disputed re-election of Pres Pierre Nkurunziza.
lead_paragraph: Witnesses heard gunshots in the Gasenyi district of the capital, Bujumbura, on Monday evening and then found Patrice Gahungu dead in his car.

headline.main: Burundi: Spokesman for Opposition Party Is Killed
headline.print_headline: Africa; Burundi: Spokesman for Opposition Party Is Killed

snippet: Witnesses heard gunshots in the Gasenyi district of the capital, Bujumbura, on Monday evening and then found Patrice Gahungu dead in his car.
